note:
Aesthetics of abstinence. Digital Disconnection Studies. Non-use ontology. Analogisation. Waves and curves and instability and contingency. Små stykker af kaos (contemplate muting Danish).

Abstinensæstetik. Digital Disconnection Studies. Ikke-brugs ontologi. Analogisering. Bølger og kurver og ustabilitet og kontingens. Small shards of chaos.

Docent, Ph.d ~ philosophy of tech
